refnamediv.refpurpose: Local execution of SPARQL via SPARQL protocol, produces a result set of SQL values.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Local execution of SPARQL via SPARQL protocol, produces a result set of SQL values.

refsect2.title: query
refsect2.para: text of SPARQL query to execute.

refsect2.title: dflt_graph
refsect2.para: default graph IRI, if not NULL then this overrides what is specified in query

refsect2.title: maxrows
refsect2.para: limit on numbers of rows that should be returned.

example.title: Simple Use
example.screen:
SQL>DB.DBA.SPARQL_EVAL('SELECT * WHERE {?s ?p ?o}','http://example/bookStore' ,10); s p o VARCHAR VARCHAR VARCHAR _______________________________________________________________________________
http://example/book3 http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/title Fundamentals http://example/book3 http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/date 2002-01-01T00:00:00 http://example/book2 http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/title Design notes http://example/book2 http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/date 2001-01-01T00:00:00
4 Rows. -- 30 msec.
